name: 黃乾怡
objective: This course provides a fundamental and practical understanding of quality control. Subjects for quality implementation will include: Dimensions of quality, 7 tools for quality improvement, Kano model, quality function deployment (QFD), failure mode and effect analysis (FMEA), Taguchi experimental deign, Systematic innovation, etc.
schedule:
1-2 Dimensions of quality, 
3-4 7 tools for quality improvement,  
5-6 Kano model of quality,  
7-8 Quality function deployment (QFD), 
9-10 Failure mode and effect analysis (FMEA),  
11-12 Taguchi experimental deign,  
13-14 Process capability 
15-16 Control chart 
17-18 Systematic innovation
scorePolicy: 1. Group report: 50% 2. Attendance 50% 3. Extra score for class participation
